title: I got a leave buster and low priority status because of Riots damn update.
body: After champion selection is done right when the screen is about to show everyones cards it just turns black and I can't even get out of it. Funny thing is, I can listen to music, turn up the volume, adjust brightness too. The client is screwed. I lost 35 LP because of this update. I was punished hard just by trying to get in games. I've tried fixing it every way you can.

replies.body: The black screen you are seeing usually indicated a network problem failing to establish a connection to the game server specifically.  Your computer might work just fine and you might even be able to use the internet just fine, but your specific connection to the game server is having an issue.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your network and adjust your settings to get through.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for some automatic processing like configuring your firewall.  Let me know if you have any questions!
